price: 1. Koroositeeh Yallih gitak (kay diinik) sinam waase mari, ken taamoomi Yalli bayseh.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
